content: abhi recent mai netherland vs pakistan ka match hua tha usme kon jeeta??

Pakistan ne recent match mein Netherlands ko 3 wickets se hara diya. Netherlands ne pehle ballebaazi karte hue 19.5 over mein 147 runs banaye. Pakistan ne ise 19.3 over mein 7 wickets gava ke achieve kar liya, score karte hue 148 runs. Yeh ek kaafi romanchak match tha jismein Pakistan ne vimukt vijay utre.
iss match mai sabse acche batting kisne ki thi??

Mujhe is match ke sambandh mein koi vishesh batting performance ki jaankari abhi nahi mil rahi hai. System data ko update kar raha hai, isi karan se ab tak ki best batting performance ki details uplabdh nahi hain. Match abhi tak sabhi ke liye romanchak raha hai aur umeed hai jaldi hi jaankari mil payegi.
